One trick I use quite a lot is ReflectionToStringBuilder from Apache
common=
s, then compare the strings:

http://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-lang=
/apidocs/org/apache/commons/lang3/builder/ReflectionToStringBuilder.html

U=
se the SHORT_PREFIX_STYLE:

http://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-lang/a=
pidocs/org/apache/commons/lang3/builder/ToStringStyle.html#SHORT_PREFIX_STY=
LE

Have fun,

Matthew Farwell.

als" matcher which prints name of the non-equal

lar matchers?

ng

eld.

s name of the non-equal field.
